区内断裂构造发育,按展布方向可分为NE 向、NNE向、近EW 向、NW 向4组。:

unique_triples = []

print("| 序号 | 头实体汇总类型 | 头实体类型 | 头实体 | 实体间的关系 | 尾实体汇总类型 | 尾实体类型 | 尾实体 | 关系属性 | 其他属性 | 原文原句 | 文章编号 | 备注 |")
print("|------|-----------------|-------------|---------|---------------|-----------------|-------------|---------|-----------|----------|-----------|----------|------|")
for i, (head, relation, tail, sentence) in enumerate(unique_triples, start=1):
    if not head or not tail or not determine_relation_validity(relation):
        continue
    head_summary_type, head_type = determine_entity_type(head, entity_types, {})
    tail_summary_type, tail_type = determine_entity_type(tail, entity_types, {})
    relation_property = "事实"  # Assuming all relations are facts for simplicity
    other_properties = "地点" if head_summary_type == '地点' or tail_summary_type == '地点' else ""
    print("|", end=" | ")

    print(f"{head_type}", end=" | ")

    print(f"{tail_type}", end=" | ")
    print(f"{tail}", end=" | ")

    print(f"{other_properties}", end=" | ")
    print(f"{sentence}", end=" | ")
    print("roy", end=" | ")
    print("", end=" | ")
    print()
